channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Justice Department report reveals FBI missteps before Jan. 6 Capitol insurrection
item.description: A new report from the Justice Department Inspector General has found the FBI could have done more to gather intelligence in the lead-up to the Jan. 6 ...

item.title: Bonnie Raitt on iconic music career and Kennedy Center honors
item.description: Bonnie Raitt reflects on her 50-year career, including iconic hits like "I Can't Make You Love Me" to her recent Kennedy Center honor.

item.title: McDonald’s employee who called 911 in CEO’s shooting is eligible for a reward, but it will take time

item.title: Mickel Cherry pleads guilty to Topeka rape, murder of 5-year-old Zoey Felix
Kennedy Center honoree Arturo Sandoval credits jazz with saving his life
item.description: Trumpeter Arturo Sandoval credits jazz for helping him to pursue his dreams in the U.S. after defecting from Cuba.

item.title: 'Multiple' drones entered airspace at New Jersey naval station: Official
item.description: There have been "multiple" instances of drones entering the airspace at a Navy weapons station in New Jersey, officials said, as concern continues to ...

item.title: Nancy Pelosi injured, undergoing medical evaluation in Luxembourg
item.description: Democratic Rep. Nancy Pelosi, 84, was hospitalized while abroad on a congressional delegation, her office said on Friday.

item.title: Musk says US is demanding he pay penalty over disclosures of his Twitter stock purchases

Trump now says bringing down grocery prices, as he promised, will be 'very hard'
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump campaigned relentlessly on grocery prices in the 2024 race. Now, he says lowering costs will be "very hard."

item.title: Woman who falsely accused Duke lacrosse players of rape admits to lying
item.description: The woman who in 2006 falsely accused three Duke University lacrosse players of rape admitted publicly that she made up the story.
